results.title: Jose Gonzales
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
The story of Jose Gonzales, a 12-year-old Puerto Rican newspaper delivery boy in Chicago, Illinois. We follow him through the trials of his first deliveries on an unfamiliar route. He quickly picks up the tricks of the trade and gets to know his many customers. His greatest moment is his return home waving his first pay cheque while his father acknowledges him as another man in the house.

results.title: Temple of twenty pagodas
results.creator_credit: Brian Hannant, John Morris and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Our Asian Neighbours: Thailand”.
In Northern Island is a monastery said to be two thousand years old. It is called “Wa Chedi Sao”, which in Northern Thai means the Temple of Twenty Pagodas. This film is about the daily life of the monastery and the village which it serves.

results.title: An Impression of John Steinbeck
results.creator_credit: Donald Wrye and United States Information Agency
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
A series of vignettes of the life and writings of the late John Steinbeck, one of the best known contemporary American authors. It includes recollections by persons who knew Steinbeck at different times during his life and some of his own comments about himself and his writing. Features Henry Fonda as the voice of Steinbeck.

results.title: Ka Rorn: southern village
results.creator_credit: Arch Nicholson, John Morris, Thanom Soongnarata and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Our Asian Neighbours: Thailand”.
At 3am the village of Ka Rorn comes to life and work begins. Produce must be taken to market in Phuket, the only major town on the island. Ka Rorn is a tight, relaxed, self-sufficient community of about 30 families. The people grow coconuts and fruit to sell in the market but, being an island village, fishing is the most lucrative industry.

results.title: Hayes Jones
results.creator_credit: Hugh King, Jerry Forman, Daniel Ruffini and Allegro Film Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
The story of New York’s new Commissioner of Recreation, a newly created post. Hayes Jones, former Olympic high hurdler, administers 900 parks, is activity director for eight million people and supervisor of 12,000 employees. We follow him through a typical working day.

results.title: Floyd Hyde
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
A portrait of the dynamic 45 year old artist-attorney, who is the popular and progressive Mayor of the city of Fresno, California. This is a large city with a population of 160,00 whose economy is dependent on the income generated by the fertile surrounding rural areas. Narrated by Barry Sullivan.

results.title: Floating rice
results.creator_credit: Arch Nicholson, John Morris, Thanom Soongnarata and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Our Asian Neighbours: Thailand”.
The simple way of life of the people in the central plains of Thailand and their method of cultivating rice is shown through the wet and dry season.

results.title: Dr Robert Simpson
results.creator_credit: Kenneth Vose, Harold Mayer and United States Information Agency
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
Dr Robert Simpson is the director of the National Hurricane Watch Centre at the University of Miami. He discusse his responsibility for tracking hurricanes which originate in the south east Atlantic and for warning the public along the Eastern Atlantic Coast on the intensity and course which the hurricanes will takes. Narrated by Barry Sullivan. Written by Kenneth Vose.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kenneth Vose, Harold Mayer and United States Information Agency

results.title: Dr DeBakey
results.creator_credit: Harold Mayer and Harold Mayer Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
The story of Dr Michael DeBakey, world renowned heart specialist and innovator of new techniques in surgery and new materials for building body organs. We follow Dr DeBakey from early morning through the entire day, forever fighting the clock.
